name: Federal funding for R&D and R&D plant for national defense and civilian functions: FYs 1955–2023
description: Federal funding for R&D and R&D plant for national defense and civilian functions: FYs 1955–2023

creator.name: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics

variableMeasured.name: value
variableMeasured.unitText: Millions of dollars and percent distribution

specialValues.D: suppressed to avoid disclosure of confidential information

notes: The National defense function includes Department of Defense military activities and Department of Energy atomic energy defense programs; some years also include defense-related R&D in the Department of Homeland Security and the Department of Justice. Civilian functions include all other federally funded R&D activities.
sources: Agencies' submissions to the Office of Management and Budget (OMB) per MAX Schedule C, agencies' budget justification documents, supplemental data obtained from agencies' budget offices, and Executive Office of the President, OMB, Budget of the United States Government, Fiscal Year 2023.
